column1: | ross carol ross, 61, passed away on june 17, 2015. she was born on august 24, 1953 in columbus to leroy l. and joanne ross who preceded her in death. surviving family includes siblings, leroy w. (bonita) ross, debbie (farrell) webb, linda (wayne) ross-ruff
column2: numerous nieces and nephews. visitation will be held monday june 22 from 11 a. m.-12:45 p. m. at newcomer funeral home and crematory, sw chapel, 3393 broadway, grove city, oh. a graveside funeral service will be held at 1 p. m. at concord cemetery. in lieu of flowers, donations may be directed to the
